rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, Mei! Is something up?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0002
rows.name: You're not sick are you?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0003
rows.name: Hey, Mei! What's up?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0004
rows.name: You'd better not be sick!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0005
rows.name: Mei. Still fighting fit, I hope.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0006
rows.name:
Yo! Mei!
What's going down?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0007
rows.name: Are you sick? By which I mean, "ill".

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0008
rows.name: Mei! Sun already up!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0009
rows.name: Wakey-wakey!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0010
rows.name: Is something wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0011
rows.name: Mei not wakey-wake.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0012
rows.name: Maybe...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0013
rows.name:
I mean, I do remember her saying she
wasn't much of a morning person.
Maybe she's still sleeping.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0014
rows.name: Should I go and wake her up?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah, okay.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0016
rows.name: Yeah. Do it.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0017
rows.name: Yes. Please do.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0018
rows.name: Yeah, get that sleepyhead out of bed!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0019
rows.name: Uh... W-what's...happening...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0020
rows.name:
Well, she's conscious, but she doesn't
exactly look...awake...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0021
rows.name:
Ughhh... Can you stop making such
a racket when I'm trying to sleep?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0022
rows.name:
How long were you planning to keep
dozing? Come on, it's morning already!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0023
rows.name: We need to get ready to go.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0024
rows.name:
Come on, sleeping beauty. Wake up and
smell the coffee.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0025
rows.name: And get your arse in gear!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0026
rows.name:
Plenty of time to sleep when you're
dead.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0027
rows.name:
The sun's up. Time to get ready to
move out.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0028
rows.name:
How long are you going to sleep for,
kiddo?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0029
rows.name: Come on. Out of bed. Embrace the day.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0030
rows.name:
Huh? Morning?
Seriously?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0031
rows.name:
Nah. I'm going to sleep for a bit longer,
thanks.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0032
rows.name: Hey! Don't go back to sleep!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0033
rows.name: Oh no you don't! Come on, up you get!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0034
rows.name: Mei. It's time to get up, I said.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0035
rows.name:
Hey! What's wrong with you!
Naptime's over!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0036
rows.name:
It's morning? So what. There's a new
one every single day, y'know.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0037
rows.name:
I didn't get to sleep till the sun came
up. Leave me to it, will you.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0038
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0039
rows.name:
Mei, why are you so terrible at getting
up?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0040
rows.name:
Why didn't you get to sleep until
morning?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0041
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0042
rows.name: Mei, what is it with you and mornings?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0043
rows.name: What kept you up so late?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0044
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0045
rows.name:
How come you're such a weakling
when it comes to mornings?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0046
rows.name: Why were you so late to bed?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0047
rows.name: What should I ask her...?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0048
rows.name:
How come you're such a lazybones in
the morning?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0049
rows.name: What kept you up so late?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0050
rows.name: Uh?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0051
rows.name:
Well, thing is, I'm actually a...
a nightstalker.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0053
rows.name:
Wow! A nightstalker!
Tora amazed!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0054
rows.name:
So does Mei have special reaction to
sunlight?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0055
rows.name:
Yup. Sunlight has this strange effect on
me. I lose power. I disappear.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0056
rows.name: Wow! Awesome!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0057
rows.name: Yes! Awesome!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0058
rows.name:
That's the deal. So you'd better let me
get some sleep.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0059
rows.name:
Thing is, there's this thing inside me.
The Geist Chevalier.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0060
rows.name: You'd better be careful. It can run riot.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0061
rows.name: Geist Chevalier?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0062
rows.name: Run riot?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0063
rows.name:
That's right. If I don't get enough rest,
then I can't control it. So if you don't
want it to go crazy...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0064
rows.name: ...it's naptime.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0065
rows.name: Hey! That won't wash! It's time to go!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0066
rows.name:
Hey! That nonsense won't work.
Come on!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0067
rows.name: Very funny. Time to go!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0068
rows.name:
Mei, if you don't get your butt in gear,
we're leaving without you.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0069
rows.name: Hmph... Worth a try.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0070
rows.name:
I had this kind of secret meeting thing
in the night.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0071
rows.name: Secret meeting, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0072
rows.name:
Yep. I met up with some buddies. We
got into some pretty dark magical
summoning stuff.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0073
rows.name:
Ah, now I get it. You met up with your
girlfriends and spent the night chatting?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0074
rows.name:
N-no! It was a really important magic
thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0075
rows.name: That's not what Hikari-chan told me.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0076
rows.name:
She said you were having a little
chat-fest with everyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0077
rows.name:
Ah! Hikari! Why'd you snitch on me?!
Big mouth...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0078
rows.name:
...What kind of stuff friends
talk about, anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0079
rows.name: Uh...never mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0080
rows.name: ※削除

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0081
rows.name:
Let me see... You were just talking
about what your favorite dessert was,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0082
rows.name: Hikari! Argh! Why I'm gonna...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0083
rows.name:
Hikari? Are you in there?
Or is it just Homura?

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0084
rows.name:
Well, whatever! Both of you are on
pretty thin ice right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0085
rows.name:
Mei, if you don't come along now,
I'm going to tell them the rest...

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0086
rows.name: That's from Hikari-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0087
rows.name:
Urgh... Wait! Wait. I got it. I'm coming!
I'm coming, okay?!

rows.label: kizunatalk080_msg0088
rows.name: Just don't say anything else...
